name: Kraft & Slash
description:
KRAFT & SLASH
Mobile Action Game
GMTK Game Jam Entry
So many weapons to craft and only one to wield. Choose wisely!
INSTRUCTIONS (Select options cog in top right for further help)
1) Drag elements to the board, tap to combine
2) Drag weapon to Equip Menu to select
3) Tap to fight!
CONTRIBUTORS
